items.sentence: Tom crouched beneath the window, listening to what was being said inside.
Do you currently take any medication prescribed to you by a psychiatrist?
A friend gave me some tips on how to make a simple but impressive dinner.
Human beings, whether they realize it or not, continually seek happiness.
Our section chief always makes a face at me when I ask him for something.
Communications have been cut off for two hours because of a thunderstorm.
Tom hopes that Mary knows that she shouldn't do what John told her to do.
Tom couldn't completely rule out the possibility Mary had killed herself.
They say that you can usually judge people by the company that they keep.
The least possible amount of oil that can be used is the proper quantity.
If Tom had been wearing a helmet, he wouldn't have been injured so badly.
I sent Tom a lot of messages today, but he hasn't replied to any of them.
I'm not so sure that I could cope with that, at least not as well as you.
Tom went up to Mary at the party and told her that he had a crush on her.
I considered teaching French, but decided that it would be better not to.
Do you think that we'll be able to solve that problem in the near future?
I want to go back to bed and try to get another couple of hours of sleep.
Tom told me that he and Mary were planning to do that tomorrow afternoon.
While I was talking to one of the clowns, Tom was talking to another one.
Mary was wearing a red dress when I saw her yesterday at the supermarket.
